text: Skazhi (o Mukhammad!): "Mne takzhe poveleno postoyanno chitat' Koran, poklonyat'sya Allakhu, razumet' Koran i prilezhno prodolzhat' prizyv k tomu, chto soderzhitsya v etom Pisanii. Tot, kto poydot po pryamomu puti, uverit v Koran i posleduyet za prorokom Mukhammadom, - delayet sebe blago, a tot, kto zabluditsya, sob'yotsya s pryamogo puti istiny, ne posleduyet za toboy, o Mukhammad, skazhi yemu: "YA - tol'ko poslannik, uveshchevayu vas i peredayu vam poslaniye Allakha
